title: Firearms Expert Reacts to Rust's Guns PART 2
description:
Jonathan Ferguson, a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries, breaks down more of the weaponry of Rust, including the P250 Pistol, the Nailgun, and even finds a real world-counterpart to the salvaged Double Barrel Shotgun.

00:00 Opening
00:30 P2/P250 Pistol
01:51 M39 Rifle
03:10 The rust in Rust
03:48 Nailgun
05:03 Eoka Pistol (revisited)
07:06 Double Barrel Shotgun
08:48 Multiple Grenade Launcher
10:05 HMLMG
11:57 Prototype 17
13:08 L96 Rifle
14:56 M92 Pistol
16:18 Python Revolver
17:38 Spas-12 Shotgun
18:37 Water Pistol
19:11 Water Gun
19:54 Outro

In the latest video in the Firearm Expert Reacts series, Jonathan Ferguson--a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries--breaks down more of the guns of Rust and compares them to their potential real-life counterparts.

Firearms Expert Reacts playlist - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y4T78VQoWUs&list=PLpg6WLs8kxGMgYb13XjPgOKbm5O-CDq7R
